Name: Under the Starlight
Inquire: Heyyy! I've been rather peeved by that angler kid lately, but that’s a whole 'nother can 'o worms. Get it? Can 'o worms? Can you please give me ten Enchanted Nightcrawlers? They make for great bait, but they living creatures too!
Objective: Collect 10 Enchanted Nightcrawlers, Sell all required materials
